steps.title: Download the software that you want to install.
steps.content: Download the software that you want to install. Put it into any folder. For example, if you wanted to install Adobe Reader , download it and put it into your "C:\FPAC_Installer" folder.

steps.title: Open the Command prompt.
steps.content: Open the Command prompt . Go to the Run, type "cmd" and press "enter" to open command prompt.

steps.title: Navigate to the folder where you kept the software EXE file.
steps.content: Navigate to the folder where you kept the software EXE file. For example, the "C:\FPAC_Installer" mentioned earlier.

steps.title: Select the software.exe file.
steps.content: Select the software.exe file. Use this command: "softwarename.exe /?". This command will check for all the switches which have been defined by the software manufacturer for this software.

steps.title: Wait for all the switches to appear.
steps.content: Wait for all the switches to appear. As you want to install the software silently, find the switch available for silent installation.

steps.title: Use this command to use the silent switch:
steps.content: Use this command to use the silent switch: "softwarename.exe /switch".

steps.title: Once you are done with the silent switch command, sit back and relax.
steps.content: Once you are done with the silent switch command, sit back and relax. Your software will get installed automatically.
